## Dimension class

[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-values/\#dimensions](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-values/#dimensions)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class Dimension<T extends string = string, U extends Unit = Unit, V extends U = U> extends Numeric<T> implements Convertible<U>, Comparable<Dimension<T, U>> 
```
